title: Up and Down
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What goes up must come down. The book Up and Down illustrates this concept to students using familiar objects. The pictures, high-frequency words, and repetitive text support beginning readers as they read.
reviewWords: dog, down, eyes, frog, hands, up
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Consonants : Identify words with the initial consonant Dd
grammar: Periods                : Recognize and understand the use of a period at the end of a sentence
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize, write, and understand the use of high-frequency words go and goes
